thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 13 of 515
thread.title: Lauren Simpson

author: Lauren Simpson
title: Lauren Simpson
text: When I initially started using the site, I had some minor issues with getting the order to my apartment. When I realized the package wouldn't arrive, I immediately used their 24/7 Chat link. They were extremely helpful in adjusting the address to fit all on one line AND compensated for the hassle. Their product/apparel is absolutely outstanding. The quality in all their outfits is exceptional for the price. It was actually the clothes that got me interested in going to the gym again. I love FABLETICS.
